stimulusHtml: The slope field for a certain differential equation is shown above. Which of the following could be a solution to the differential equation with the initial condition y ( 0 ) = 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E3D@ ?
choicesHtml: y = cos x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF0@

y = 1 − x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3ECD@

y = e x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D53@

y = 1 − x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EFC@

y = 1 1 + x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FCB@
